name: Arima Lodge
description:
Arima Lodge Story

Within the domed city of a dystopian future, Kai the bellhop rides the elevator of Arima Lodge, the hotel he works at, up from the ground floor to get a relief. However, after a secretive man rushes into the elevator and compels him to get to the 100th floor —the rooftop— instead, he starts to realize something very serious is amiss.

Controls

[Cursor] to hover, and [primary click] to confirm selection.

Works for both dialogue options and QTEs.
